WRITING.TEXT: I'm liking the new interface and all but Nintendo really needs to step up when it comes to naming their products. I bet there's going to be a good amount of disappointed children getting the regular 3ds model because of uninformed parents.
So Lucina is basically going to be Marth for beginners?
In regards to the other characters as alternate costumes, you might be mistaking sakurai with the PMBR team. At least I don't remember sakurai stating that.
But the thing is snow also agreed she looked familiar

The only complaint that I would have to make with this. [Spoiler](#s "Bigby mentions in his first meeting with Faith(which was before meeting Nerissa) was that he feels like she had a sense of familiarity to her. Maybe the realization might be what you said but what irks me still is what was the connection of his initial familiarity with Faith") Correct me if I got anything wrong.

WRITING.TITLE: House is objective, home is subjective
